Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: OpenCms can be installed automatically. Parameters used in the installation are provided via a config file and then an Java program shipped with OpenCms sets up OpenCms. Here you learn how to set up OpenCms using the auto-setup.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Learn how to set up OpenCms using the auto-setup.

Link.LinkText: Alternatively, you can use the Setup wizard and configure your installation via a web-interface.
